1、在hosts文件下添加以下配置
192.168.1.10 www.597.cs
192.168.1.10 m.597.cs
192.168.1.10 xm.597.cs
192.168.1.10 qz.597.cs
192.168.1.10 np.597.cs
192.168.1.10 mysql.597.cs
#192.168.1.10 cdn.597.com
#192.168.1.10 cdn1.597.com
192.168.1.10 cdn.597.cs
192.168.1.10 crm.597.cs
192.168.1.10 api.597.cs
192.168.1.10 pic.597.cs
#192.168.1.10 pic.597.com
192.168.1.10 sh.m.597.cs
192.168.1.10 xm.m.597.cs
192.168.1.10 huli.m.597.cs
192.168.1.10 bj.597.cs
192.168.1.10 bj.m.597.cs
192.168.1.10 www1.597.cs
192.168.1.10 huli.597.cs
192.168.1.10 fj.597.cs
192.168.1.10 fz.597.cs
192.168.1.10 agent.597.cs
192.168.1.10 zz.597.cs
192.168.1.10 jinjiang.597.cs
192.168.1.10 hunter.597.cs
192.168.1.10 tj.597.cs
192.168.1.10 mc.597.cs
192.168.1.10 img.597.cs
192.168.1.10 mi.597.cs
192.168.1.10 cdn.597.cs
192.168.1.10 pt.597.cs
192.168.1.10 pt.m.597.cs
192.168.1.10 chengxiang.597.cs
192.168.1.10 pthj.597.cs
192.168.1.10 ptlc.597.cs
192.168.1.10 ptxy.597.cs
192.168.1.10 xianyou.597.cs
192.168.1.10 ly.597.cs
192.168.1.10 ly.m.597.cs
192.168.1.10 sm.597.cs
192.168.1.10 sm.m.597.cs
192.168.1.10 meilie.597.cs


2、使用域名http://xm.597.cs/访问测试网站环境

3、可以直接通过局域网\\192.168.1.10\修改对应目录下的代码。
